name: Super Metroid: Cliffhanger Redux
overview: Redux has revived the planet with new rooms, savestations, refurbished layouts, and a renewed storyline. From top to bottom, everything has been updated. It was and is now at its core a challenge hack, a game to fire up and hone your skills. Secondly it tells a story, locate all 5 Chozodian Lores to complete the mystery behind Planet Uviol.
